title: Add Content-Type headers and JSON response format
description: Health endpoints return empty responses. Add Content-Type headers and JSON responses like {"status":"healthy"} for debugging.

title: Expand README with usage and API documentation
description: README is only 11 lines. Add: build/run/deploy instructions, API endpoint docs, curl examples, prerequisites, troubleshooting.

title: Fix race condition in global state (liveness/readiness variables)
description: Global variables liveness and readiness in main.go are modified by HTTP handlers without synchronization. Concurrent requests can cause data races. Fix by using sync.RWMutex or atomic operations.

title: Update Docker base image to golang:1.21-alpine
description: Dockerfile uses golang:1.14.1-alpine3.11 from 2020. Update to golang:1.21-alpine for security fixes.

title: Update Go version from 1.14 to 1.21+
description: go.mod uses Go 1.14 (March 2020). Update to Go 1.21+ for security patches, performance improvements, and modern features.

title: Implement graceful shutdown handling
description: Application doesn't handle SIGTERM/SIGINT. Add context-based shutdown with connection draining for proper K8s termination.

title: Fix potential issues with my repo
Add unit tests for HTTP handlers
description: No test coverage exists. Add tests for /healthz, /readiness, /toggle/* endpoints, and concurrent access verification. Target 80%+ coverage.

title: Fix spelling error in template: inactice â†’ inactive
description: templates/index.html line 8 has spelling error 'inactice' should be 'inactive'.

title: Fix hardcoded image reference in deployment.yaml
description: Image 'k8s-health-and-readiness' has no registry or tag. Use proper image reference with registry and version.

title: Add GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
description: Add workflow for automated testing, Docker builds, linting (golangci-lint), security scanning (gosec), and coverage reporting.

title: Improve K8s probe configuration
description: Add timeoutSeconds, failureThreshold, successThreshold. Consider startup probe. initialDelaySeconds: 3 is aggressive.

title: Make port configurable via environment variable
description: Port 8080 is hardcoded in main.go. Make configurable via PORT environment variable for deployment flexibility.

title: Add security context to K8s deployment
description: Add runAsNonRoot: true, readOnlyRootFilesystem: true, allowPrivilegeEscalation: false to deployment.

title: Add resource limits and requests to K8s deployment
description: k8s/deployment.yaml missing CPU/memory requests and limits. Critical for cluster scheduling and stability.
